iva1210.question: iva1210
iva1210.name: iva1210
iva1210.label: Were there any technical problems during the interview?
iva1210.label_de: Gab es waehrend des Interviews technische Probleme?

items.text: Were there any technical problems during the interview?
items.text_de: Gab es waehrend des Interviews technische Probleme?

iva0406.question: iva0406
iva0406.name: iva0406
iva0406.label: Were there any disturbances during the interview? And if so, how often did these disturbances occur? Please indicate here any disruptions that occurred during the interview. This includes interventions by other persons (parents, children, partners) as well as interruptions of the interview, e.g. due to other telephone calls, or domestic activities carried out at the same time, distractions by children.
iva0406.label_de: Gab es waehrend des Interviews Stoerungen? Und wenn ja, wie haeufig kamen diese Stoerungen vor? Bitte geben Sie hier alle Stoerungen an, die waehrend des Interviews aufgetreten sind. Dazu gehoeren sowohl Eingriffe durch andere Personen (Eltern, Kinder, Partner), als auch Unterbrechungen des Interviews, z.B. aufgrund von anderen Telefonanrufen, oder gleichzeitig ausgeuebten haeuslichen Aktivitaeten, Ablenkungen durch Kinder.

items.text: Were there any disturbances during the interview? And if so, how often did these disturbances occur? Please indicate here any disruptions that occurred during the interview. This includes interventions by other persons (parents, children, partners) as well as interruptions of the interview, e.g. due to other telephone calls, or domestic activities carried out at the same time, distractions by children.
items.text_de: Gab es waehrend des Interviews Stoerungen? Und wenn ja, wie haeufig kamen diese Stoerungen vor? Bitte geben Sie hier alle Stoerungen an, die waehrend des Interviews aufgetreten sind. Dazu gehoeren sowohl Eingriffe durch andere Personen (Eltern, Kinder, Partner), als auch Unterbrechungen des Interviews, z.B. aufgrund von anderen Telefonanrufen, oder gleichzeitig ausgeuebten haeuslichen Aktivitaeten, Ablenkungen durch Kinder.

iva1107.question: iva1107
iva1107.name: iva1107
iva1107.label: Was the respondent able to follow the telephone interview easily?
iva1107.label_de: Konnte der/die Befragte dem Telefoninterview leicht folgen?
